verses.verse: Now <WG1161> concerning things sacrificed to idols: <WG1494> We <WG2192> know <WG1492> that <WG3754> we <WG2192> all <WG3956> have <WG2192> knowledge. <WG1108> Knowledge <WG1108> puffs up, <WG5448> but <WG1161> love <WG26> builds up. <WG5448>
But <WG1161> if <WG1487> anyone <WG5100> thinks <WG1380> that he knows <WG1097> anything, <WG5100> he doesn't <WG3762> yet <WG3764> know <WG1492> as <WG2531> he ought <WG1163> to know. <WG1097>
But <WG1161> if <WG1487> anyone <WG5100> loves <WG25> God, <WG2316> the same <WG3778> is known <WG1097> by <WG5259> him. <WG846>

Therefore <WG3767> concerning <WG4012> the eating <WG1035> of things sacrificed to idols, <WG1494> we know <WG1492> that <WG3754> no idol <WG1497> is anything <WG3762> in <WG1722> the world, <WG2889> and <WG2532> that <WG3754> there is no <WG3762> other <WG2087> God <WG2316> but <WG1487> <WG3361> one. <WG1520>

For <WG1063> though <WG1512> there are <WG1526> things that are called <WG3004> "gods, <WG2316>" whether <WG1535> in <WG1722> the heavens <WG3772> or <WG1535> on <WG1909> earth; <WG1093> as <WG5618> there are <WG1526> many <WG4183> "gods <WG2316>" and <WG2532> many <WG4183> "lords; <WG2962>"

yet <WG235> to us <WG2254> there is one <WG1520> God, <WG2316> the Father, <WG3962> of <WG1537> whom <WG3739> are all things, <WG3956> and <WG2532> we <WG2249> for <WG1519> him; <WG846> and <WG2532> one <WG1520> Lord, <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> through <WG1223> whom <WG3739> are all things, <WG3956> and <WG2532> we <WG2249> live through <WG1223> him. <WG846>

However, <WG235> that knowledge <WG1108> isn't <WG1722> in all men. <WG3956> But <WG1161> some, <WG5100> with consciousness <WG4893> of the idol <WG1497> until <WG2193> now, <WG737> eat <WG2068> as <WG5613> of a thing sacrificed to <WG2193> an idol, <WG1494> and <WG2532> their <WG846> conscience, <WG4893> being <WG5607> weak, <WG772> is defiled. <WG3435>

But <WG1161> food <WG1033> will not <WG3756> commend <WG3936> us <WG2248> to God. <WG2316> For <WG1063> neither, <WG3777> if <WG1437> we don't <WG3361> eat, <WG5315> are we the worse; <WG5302> nor, <WG3777> if <WG1437> we eat, <WG5315> are we the better. <WG4052>
But <WG1161> be careful <WG991> that by no means <WG3381> does this <WG3778> liberty <WG1849> of yours <WG5216> become <WG1096> a stumbling block <WG4348> to the <WG3588> weak. <WG770>

For <WG1063> if <WG1437> a man <WG5100> sees <WG1492> you <WG4571> who have <WG2192> knowledge <WG1108> sitting <WG2621> in <WG1722> an idol <WG1493>'s temple, <WG3618> won't <WG3780> his <WG846> conscience, <WG4893> if he is <WG5607> weak, <WG772> be emboldened <WG3618> to eat <WG2068> <WG1519> things sacrificed to idols? <WG1494>
And <WG2532> through <WG1909> your <WG4674> knowledge, <WG1108> <WG622> he who is weak <WG770> perishes, <WG622> the brother <WG80> for <WG1223> whose sake <WG3739> Christ <WG5547> died. <WG599>

<WG1161> Thus, <WG264> sinning <WG3779> against <WG1519> the brothers, <WG80> and <WG2532> wounding <WG5180> their <WG846> conscience <WG4893> when it is weak, <WG770> you sin <WG264> against <WG1519> Christ. <WG5547>

Therefore, <WG1355> if <WG1487> food <WG1033> causes <WG4624> my <WG3450> brother <WG80> to stumble, <WG4624> I will eat <WG5315> <WG3756> no <WG3361> meat <WG2907> <WG1519> forevermore, <WG165> that <WG3361> I don't <WG4624> cause my <WG3450> brother <WG80> to <WG2443> stumble. <WG4624>
